topic.title: MY TIME AT PORTIA â€“ V1.0.128955 + 4 DLCS
topic.body:
**Repack Features**
*Based on My.Time.At.Portia-CODEX ISO release: codex-my.time.at.portia.iso (4,908,974,080 bytes)
*Updates My.Time.At.Portia.Update.v1.0.128791-CODEX (58 MB) and *My.Time.At.Portia.Update.v1.0.128955-CODEX (200 MB) installed over
*4 DLCs (All Kickstarter Rewards) included and activated
*100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
*NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
*Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 4.8 to 2.5 GB)
*Installation takes 4-10 minutes (depending on your system)
*After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
*HDD space after installation: 5 GB (~9 GB during installation)
*Language can be changed in game settings
*At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
